Package io.micronaut.websocket.context

Interface WebSocketBean<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The target type
public interface WebSocketBean<T>
Wrapper around a WebSocket instance that enables the retrieval of the appropriate methods.
Since:
1.0
Author:
graemerocher
